solution_line_template: From the {start_floor}th floor, the elevator went down to the {start_floor} - {down_1} = <<{start_floor}-{down_1}={after_down}>>{after_down}nd floor.
Then went up to the {after_down} + {up_1} = <<{after_down}+{up_1}={after_up1}>>{after_up1}th floor.
Then, went up to the {after_up1} + {up_2} = <<{after_up1}+{up_2}={top_floor}>>{top_floor}th floor; hence there are {top_floor} floors in the building.
